DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy , Pharmacokinetics , Safety Bolus Maintenance Doses Org 9426 ( Study P05976 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Subjects least 20 65 year age . Subjects asa class 1 , 2 3 general elective surgery . Subjects consider pregnant . Subjects schedule elective surgery sevoflurane propofol anesthesia , anticipate duration surgery 1.53 hour . Subjects normal laboratory value serum electrolyte ( Na+ , K+ , Cl ) , BUN , creatinine , total bilirubin , ALP , ALAT ASAT judge investigator subinvestigator . Subjects received explanation trial agree informed consent write participate trial advance . Subjects renal dysfunction complication history . Subjects serum creatinine level great 1.6 mg/dL . Subjects severe hepatic dysfunction complication history . Subjects know significant metabolic neuromuscular disorder . Subjects show dyspnea , airway obstruction bronchial asthma . Subjects history hypersensitivity pancuronium bromide , vecuronium bromide bromine . Subjects atopic disease . Subjects develop systemic allergic symptom . Subjects receive antihistamine antiallergic agent 1 month . Subjects receive follow drug know affect action neuromuscular blocking agent surgery day : calcium antagonist ; anticonvulsant ; aminoglycoside antibiotic ; polypeptide antibiotic ; metronidazole . Subjects hypothermic anesthesia . Subjects participate research subject another trial within last 6 month participate trial . Other subject judge ineligible subject trial discretion investigator subinvestigator .
